TtForm.RequiredFieldText: '{0}' is a required field. Please supply a valid value to complete this transition.

TtLabel.name: Tag/Label
TtLabel.Description: Optional categorical words to be applied to the CR record, for later use by the product team

GenericWidget.name: SubtasksActionList
GenericWidget.GlobalContent: <script type="text/javascript" src="$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/javascript/ActionListExt.js"></script> <link rel="stylesheet" type="text/css" href="$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/styles/actionList-1.0.css"></link>
GenericWidget.Template: <script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/javascript/ActionListUtilities.js\"></'+'script>\ <script>\ var SubtasksActionListParams = [];\ var SubtasksActionListCheckFilter = function(a){\ if(a.name && a.value){\ var SubtasksActionListPrefixed = /^F_TS_.+/i.test(a.name);\ if (!SubtasksActionListPrefixed){\ var SubtasksActionListTemp = \"F_TS_\"+a.name;\ a.name = SubtasksActionListTemp;\ }\ SubtasksActionListParams.push(a);\ }\ };\ \ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({name:\'F_TS_PARENT_TASK\',value:\'{0}\'});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionListCheckFilter({});\ \ var SubtasksActionListSize;\ switch (\"\"){\ case \"Small\":\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"500\", height: \"400\" };\ break;\ case \"Medium\":\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"900\", height: \"600\" };\ break;\ case \"Large\":\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ break;\ case \"Full Screen\":\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"100%\", height: \"100%\" };\ break;\ default:\ SubtasksActionListSize = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ }\ \ jQuerySBM(document).ready(function() {\ jQuerySBM(\"#SubtasksActionListWrapper\").actionList({\ reportID: \"USR_CS_TASKS.Tasks_FT\",\ appRptProjId: \"State\",\ reportParams: SubtasksActionListParams,\ groupByField: \"Medium\",\ dialogSize: SubtasksActionListSize,\ emptyFieldText: \"(None)\",\ widgetName: \"SubtasksActionList\"\ });\ }); \ </'+'script>\

GenericWidget.name: SubtasksActionList2
GenericWidget.Template: <script type=\"text/javascript\" src=\"$FORM_EXTENSION_ASSET_PATH(Action List Extension)/javascript/ActionListUtilities.js\"></'+'script>\ <script>\ var SubtasksActionList2Params = [];\ var SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter = function(a){\ if(a.name && a.value){\ var SubtasksActionList2Prefixed = /^F_TS_.+/i.test(a.name);\ if (!SubtasksActionList2Prefixed){\ var SubtasksActionList2Temp = \"F_TS_\"+a.name;\ a.name = SubtasksActionList2Temp;\ }\ SubtasksActionList2Params.push(a);\ }\ };\ \ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({name:\'F_TS_PARENT_TASK\',value:\'{0}\'});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ SubtasksActionList2CheckFilter({});\ \ var SubtasksActionList2Size;\ switch (\"\"){\ case \"Small\":\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"500\", height: \"400\" };\ break;\ case \"Medium\":\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"900\", height: \"600\" };\ break;\ case \"Large\":\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ break;\ case \"Full Screen\":\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"100%\", height: \"100%\" };\ break;\ default:\ SubtasksActionList2Size = { width: \"1024\", height: \"768\" };\ }\ \ jQuerySBM(document).ready(function() {\ jQuerySBM(\"#SubtasksActionList2Wrapper\").actionList({\ reportID: \"USR_CS_TASKS.InactiveTasks_FT\",\ appRptProjId: \"State\",\ reportParams: SubtasksActionList2Params,\ groupByField: \"Medium\",\ dialogSize: SubtasksActionList2Size,\ emptyFieldText: \"(None)\",\ widgetName: \"SubtasksActionList2\"\ });\ }); \ </'+'script>\

StaticText.name: Text7
StaticText.Text: These are comments you may leave for others to see and respond to.

TtLabel.name: Active/Inactive
TtLabel.Description: Whether the item is active or inactive in its current state

TtLabel.name: Owner
TtLabel.Description: The primary person who currently owns the item

TtLabel.name: Submit Date
TtLabel.Description: The date that the item was created/submitted

TtLabel.name: Item Id
TtLabel.Description: The displayed identifier of the item

TtLabel.name: Last Modified Date
TtLabel.Description: The last time the item's data was changed

TtLabel.name: Project
TtLabel.Description: The project in which this item resides

TtLabel.name: Last Modifier
TtLabel.Description: The last person to change the data in this item

TtLabel.name: Last State Changer
TtLabel.Description: The last person to change the state of this item

TtLabel.name: Last State Change Date
TtLabel.Description: The last time the state of this item was changed

TtLabel.name: Close Date
TtLabel.Description: The date that the item was closed

TtLabel.name: Submitter
TtLabel.Description: The person who created/submitted the item

TtLabel.name: Submitting Agent
TtLabel.Description: The person who submitted the item, even if submitted on behalf of another.

TtLabel.name: State
TtLabel.Description: The current state of the item

TtLabel.name: Secondary Owner
TtLabel.Description: The secondary people who currently own the item
